subject: Order #SSN4100
description_text:
Hello,

I received this order today, however it was only the 2 boxes with the
pedals and baseplate in it. I did not receive the Haptic motors I ordered
or the brackets to install them. Please advise.

Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Mark Saba,    This is your package containing haptic motors, delivered on the 8th. Please check your front door and ask your family or neighbors.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SWX407070000009066913

I can assure it was not delivered. All packages are delivered to a package
room in the building, as seen from the proof of delivery for the pedals
delivered by fedex. The tracking provided for the haptic has no town,
picture or proof of delivery of any kind. The  17track only says customer
sign off, which I didn’t and it does not have a customer sign off at all



On Thu, Dec 11, 2025 at 9:38 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Mark Saba,     Yes, there was no signature service, but it was indeed delivered. Please check the delivery confirmation photo.
